meanings.definition: The quality or state of being alkaline.
meanings.sent1: The alkalinity of the soil helps plants grow strong and healthy.
meanings.sent2: The scientist measured the alkalinity of the water in the lab.
meanings.sent3: The alkalinity of the soap made it perfect for cleaning tough stains.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness had an alkalinity that soothed everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The alkalinity of his words left a lasting impact on the audience.

meanings.definition: The capacity of a solution to neutralize acids.
meanings.sent1: The alkalinity of the antacid helped relieve his stomach ache.
meanings.sent2: Farmers test the alkalinity of the irrigation water to ensure crop health.
meanings.sent3: The alkalinity of the baking soda saved the cake from being too sour.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter had an alkalinity that dissolved his worries instantly.
meanings.sent5: The alkalinity of his presence balanced out the tension in the room.
